name: Jolly Headhunter
description: Spreading the holiday cheer... with bullets.

heroPerk.name: Present... Arms!
heroPerk.description: Eliminated enemies have a <Number>15% chance</> to drop a present. Presents grant a buff lasting <Number>8 seconds</> which can be <Number>109%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Movement Speed</>, <Number>107%</> <ModifiedAttribute>Damage</>, or <Number>21.6</> <ModifiedAttribute>Energy</> over time.

recruitment.sourceText: Found inside Holiday Llamas in the Llama Shop.
